# <a name="create-an-email-signature-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="157c9-102">Ustvarite e-poštni podpis v Outlooku na spletu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="157c9-102">Create an email signature in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="157c9-103">pojdi k</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="157c9-103">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="157c9-104">**Nastavitve** > **Poglej si vse Outlookove nastavitve** > **sestavi in odgovor**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="157c9-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Compose and reply**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="157c9-105">Pod **e-poštni podpis**, vnesite svoj podpis in možnosti oblikovanja spremeniti svoj videz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="157c9-105">Under **Email signature**, type your signature and use the available formatting options to change its appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="157c9-106">*Opomba:* Imate lahko samo en podpis na račun.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="157c9-106">*Note:* You can have only one signature per account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="157c9-107">Če želite izvedeti več, glejte [Ustvari in dodate e-poštni podpis v Outlooku na spletu](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="157c9-107">To learn more, see [Create and add an email signature in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span></span>
